t: Amazon | Veteran-owned small businesses
s: When I couldn’t find a safe, clean product that could help keep toys and food in place, I started Busy Baby with my brother, Eric. Seven years later, we have a line of interchangeable products to keep babies’ things within reach and off the ground at home and on the go.

t: Amazon.com: Consumer Veteran Business Leader Program
s: The Consumer organization values the skills and attributes veterans bring to us every day. What does that mean? That means that if you have a defined set of skills and experience, it doesn't truly matter if your resume fits one-for-one. What matters is that you've already proven most of your skills while serving and you've set yourself apart. We will ask you for specific examples of where you've expressed certain attributes and led by example. Identify new brand ...

t: U.S. Military Hiring
s: At Amazon, more than 45,000 veterans and military spouses are driving innovation and raising the bar on customer experience. Each day, they apply their knowledge, skills, and leadership abilities in a wide variety of careers around the world.
